overview: A quirky businessman in his 40s was looking for a creative outlet and stumbled upon an archaic form of photography that changed his life's path. 8 years later, his Native American wet plate photos are being archived around the globe, and his recent portrait session with Greta Thunberg at Standing Rock Indian Reservation has been seen by millions and is in the vaults of the Library of Congress.- From Amazon
title: Balkowitsch
